description:
As Black Rabbit explains the situation to Izayoi, the girls meet with a representative of Fores Garo and make their first enemy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il paraît que la lolita en kimono est une personne plutôt ahurissante ?
Seems Like a Crazy Loli Clad in Japanese Clothing?
Wasou Loli wa Iroiro Buttonda Okata no You Desu yo?
和装ロリはいろいろブっ飛んだお方のようですよ?
